Module de.cuioss.uimodel
Package de.cuioss.uimodel.nameprovider

Class DisplayMessageProvider

java.lang.Object
de.cuioss.uimodel.nameprovider.DisplayMessageProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDisplayNameProvider<DisplayMessageFormat>, Serializable
public class DisplayMessageProvider extends Object implements IDisplayNameProvider<DisplayMessageFormat>
DisplayMessageProvider provide DisplayMessageFormat to be able to transport key and arguments which can be used for MessageFormat
Author:
Eugen Fischer

      public String getMessageFormated(ResourceBundle bundle)
      Parameters:
      bundle - ResourceBundle must not be null
      Returns:
      formated text
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - if no object for the given key can be found
      IllegalArgumentException - if bundle is null, or if the pattern is invalid, or if an argument in the arguments array is not of the type expected by the format element(s) that use it.
